►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Mediatek announced the Dimensity 9400+ with a Bluetooth range of 10km or 6.2 miles, China made GPMI, a competitor to HDMI and Trump closed the De Minimis rules & impmemented new fees, killing off Temu, Shein, Amazon Haul, etc.

Episode 244
